get.description: Returns a list of batches with pagination
Returns comprehensive details about a specific batch by batchId
Returns comprehensive details about a specific batch by batchHeaderHash
Returns batch details by either batchId or batchHeaderHash

400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.

code.description: A short code indicating the error code returned.

message.description: A human readable explanation of what went wrong.

doc_url.description: A link to our documentation with more details about this error code

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: The ID of the batch to fetch non-signer information for

operatorId.description: The ID of the non-signing operator

operator.description: The name of the non-signing operator

socket.description: The socket of the non-signing operator

status.description: The status of the non-signing operator

total.description: The total number of non-signers for the batch
